12.29.24  12:46 am   I find it very difficult to follow the lyrics of a song if I'm not reading them at the same time I'm listening to the song. There will be words and sentences that I won't understand because of the melody or the way the singer is singing them, and it's difficult to see the connections between sentences in the same section. And if I'm trying to focus on what a specific instrument is playing or something about the music other than the lyrics, then it's as if most of the words don't even register in my head. However, I imagine that most people are not attentively reading the lyrics while they're listening to a song, so I always wonder if I'm just not very good at hearing lyrics or if it's just common to not really pay much attention to the lyrics of a song and try to understand them as if reading a paragraph in a book.
